title: SPAC Week II: Cannabis SPACs
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: SPAC Week II continues with Chris DeMuth Jr, Seeking Alpha Marketplace author and SPAC superstar. He discusses SPACs in general, cannabis SPACs in particular and his favorites with Rena Sherbill. What to look for in a SPAC, trading vs investing and why Chris likes Aphria and Canada. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
